info.title: DTV API
info.description: The `DTV` plugin provides access to DVB services provided by a DVB stack.

name.description: Name of the country as a UTF-8 string

name.summary: User specified name for the LNB settings

ispulseposition.summary: Pulse position motor used to control dish position

isdiseqcposition.summary: Dish positioning is controlled by DiSEqC

diseqcrepeats.summary: Number of times to send a DiSEqC message to make sure it's been received

name.summary: User specified name for the satellite settings

longitude.description: Longitudinal location of the satellite in 1/10ths of a degree, with an east coordinate given as a positive value and a west coordinate as negative. Astra 28.2E would be defined as 282 and Eutelsat 5.0W would be -50.

lnb.summary: Name of the LNB settings to be used when tuning to this satellite

dvbstuningparams.summary: Parameters required to tune to a DVB-S/S2 signal

satellite.summary: Name of the satellite settings to be used

frequency.summary: Frequency of the transponder, in kHz

dvbs2.summary: True when tuning to a DVB-S2 signal

dvbctuningparams.summary: Parameters required to tune to a DVB-C signal

frequency.summary: Frequency of the transport, in Hz

dvbttuningparams.summary: Parameters required to tune to a DVB-T/T2 signal

frequency.summary: Frequency of the transport, in Hz

dvbt2.summary: True when tuning to a DVB-T2 signal

plpid.summary: PLP ID for tuning to a DVB-T2 signal

dvburistring.summary: DVB triplet of the form a.b.c, where 'a' is the original network ID, 'b' is the transport ID and 'c' is the service ID, in decimal

servicetype.summary: (Version 2) Service type as given by the service descriptor in the SDT

runningstatus.summary: (Version 2) The running status as given by the service descriptor in the SDT

fullname.summary: (Version 2) Full service name as given by the service descriptor in the SDT

shortname.summary: Short service name as given by the service descriptor in the SDT

scrambled.summary: (Version 2) True if the service is marked as scrambled in the SDT

hascadescriptor.summary: (Version 2) True if there is at least one CA descriptor in the service's PMT

hidden.summary: (Version 2) True if the service should be hidden

selectable.summary: (Version 2) True if the service should be user selectable

originalnetworkid.summary: Original network ID of the transport

name.summary: Name of the DVB event as defined in the short event descriptor

starttime.summary: UTC start time of the event in seconds

duration.summary: Duration of the event in seconds

eventid.summary: ID of the event from the event information table

shortdescription.summary: Event description from the EIT short event descriptor
shortdescription.example: The current national and world news

hasaudiodescription.summary: (Version 2) True if audio description is available

parentalrating.summary: (Version 2) Parental rating for the event, will be 0 if undefined

contentdata.summary: (Version 2) The first 2 4-bit values from the content descriptor as separate bytes

hasextendedinfo.summary: (Version 2) True if there's extended event information available

extendedeventinfo.summary: (Version 2) Event information from the EIT extended event descriptor

component.summary: Video, audio, subtitle, teletext or data component info

type.summary: Type of data contained in this component

video.summary: Video related information for a video component

audio.summary: Audio related information for an audio component

type.summary: Type of the audio contained in the component

subtitles.summary: DVB subtitle related information for a subtitle component

format.summary: Intended TV format for the subtitles

compositionpage.summary: Composition page to be used for subtitles in this component

ancillarypage.summary: Ancillary page to be used for subtitles in this component

teletext.summary: Teletext related information for a teletext component

magazine.summary: Magazine number for this type and language

page.summary: Page number for this type and language

eventtype.summary: Event type that's sent as an asynchronous notification

countryList.summary: Array containing the name and 3 character ISO country code for all the available country configurations

country.summary: Country configuration using the ISO 3-character country code

lnbList.summary: Array of LNBs defined in the database

satelliteList.summary: Array of satellites defined in the database

numberOfServices.summary: Total number of services in the service database

serviceList.summary: List of services for the given type of tuner, transport (version 2), or all services if neither is given

index.name: Optional tuner type, or transport DVB doublet

serviceInfo.summary: Information for the given service as defined by its DVB triplet URI

serviceComponents.summary: (Version 2) array of components for the given service defined by its URI

transportInfo.summary: Information for the given transport as defined by its DVB doublet URI

nowNextEvents.summary: Now and next events (EITp/f) for the given service

scheduleEvents.summary: Events which are scheduled (EITsched) for the given service

index.name: Service URI string, with optional start and end times as number of seconds UTC

extendedEventInfo.summary: Extended event info for the given service and event ID (version 2)

index.name: Service URI string and event ID

status.summary: Information related to the play handle defined by the index

tuner.summary: The tuner id used by the play handle

demux.summary: The demux id used by the play handle

pmtpid.summary: The PMT PID of the service being played

lcn.summary: LCN of the service being played

signalInfo.summary: strength and quality of the currently tuned signal for the given play handle (version 2)

strength.summary: The signal strength as a percentage

quality.summary: The signal quality as a percentage

addLnb.summary:
Add a new LNB to the database.
  
### Events 

 No Events

result.summary: true if the LNB is added, false otherwise

addSatellite.summary:
Add a new satellite to the database.
  
### Events 

 No Events

result.summary: true if the satellite is added, false otherwise

startServiceSearch.summary:
Starts a service search.
 
### Events  
| Event | Description | 
| :----------- | :----------- | 
|`searchstatus`|Triggered during the course of a service search.|
 |`serviceupdated`|Triggered when a service is added|

retune.summary: true if current services are to be replaced in the database, false if the scan is to update the existing services

usetuningparams.summary: Set to true if the optional tuning parameters are defined

result.summary: true if the search is started, false otherwise

finishServiceSearch.summary:
Finishes a service search.
  
### Events 

 No Events

savechanges.summary: true if the services found during the search should be saved

result.summary: false if the tunertype isn't valid, true otherwise

startPlaying.summary:
Starts playing the specified service.
  
### Events
| Event | Description |
| :----------- | :----------- |
|`serviceupdated`|Triggered when info for a service changes|
|`eventchanged`|Triggered when the EIT 'now' event changes|
|`videochanged`|Triggered when the video PID or codec are changed|
|`audiochanged`|Triggered when the audio PID or codec are changed|
|`subtitleschanged`|Triggered when the subtitle PID or details are changed|

lcn.summary: LCN of the service to be tuned to

monitoronly.summary: (Version 2) set to 'true' to monitor SI/PSI data only. Will default to 'false' if not defined

result.summary: The play handle assigned to play the given service. Will be -1 if the service can't be played

stopPlaying.summary:
Stops playing the specified service.
  
### Events 

 No Events

params.summary: The play handle returned by startPlaying

searchstatus.summary: Triggered during the course of a service search

handle.summary: The handle assigned for the search and to which this information is relevant

finished.summary: true if the service search has finished, false otherwise

progress.summary: Progress of the search expressed as a percentage

serviceupdated.summary: (Version 2) Notification sent when details of a service have changed, such as its name, service type, running or scrambled state

serviceadded.summary: (Version 2) Notification sent when a new service has been dynamically added to the service list

servicedeleted.summary: (Version 2) Notification sent when a service has been deleted from the service list

videochanged.summary: (Version 2) Notification sent when the video PID or codec has changed

audiochanged.summary: (Version 2) Notification sent when the audio PID or codec has changed

subtitleschanged.summary: (Version 2) Notification sent when the subtitles have changed

eventchanged.summary: (Version 2) Notification sent when the EIT 'now' event is received when starting to play a service and when the 'now' event changes
